title: ‘Mad Scientist’ Triathlon Coach Olav Bu and His Mission to Transform Cycling at Uno-X: ‘There Are Low-Hanging Fruits to Grab’
content:
Olav Aleksandr Bu conquered world triathlon with Blummenfelt and Iden, but promises he won't bring a copy-paste approach to his upstart Norwegian cycling team.

Read the full article at ‘Mad Scientist’ Triathlon Coach Olav Bu and His Mission to Transform Cycling at Uno-X: ‘There Are Low-Hanging Fruits to Grab’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
